name: Alice In Wonderland (itch) (Oracle of Athens)
description:
Camera rotation = RightClick

Camera pan  = RightClick + asdw keys

Camera zoom = mouseWheel

Move = Arrow Keys

Interact with Object = Space

Help Alice navigate the gameboards. You can only move if you have daisies. Paint white roses red.  Once all the rose bushes are red a flag will appear. Place the flag in the firepit to unlock a bridge to the next gameboard. Avoid spikes, water, and monsters.
